LanguageData.JRWNanuqsaurusReconstruct.label: Nanuqsaurus
LanguageData.JRWNanuqsaurusReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #09372-2014 [NANUQSAURUS HOGLUNDI] CODENAME: KOKOGIAK >4452
A dwarf tyrannosaur covered in a downy hide of white fur. Like polar bears, it boasts black skin underneath, insulating itself for the cold boreal winters.
